rukus.text: 89|1|Phajarara samayara sapata
89|2|sapata daha raatira
89|3|sapata yora arau biyorara
89|4|sapata raatira, yetiya i bidaya laya.
89|5|Iyara majata bodhasampanna byaktira babe drrha pramana na'ine
89|6|tumi dekha na'ine, tomara pratipalake ada sampradayara lagata ki acarana karaichila
89|7|iraama gotrara lagata, yihamte adhikarai achila su'ucca prasadara
89|8|yara samatulya (jati) kono desate srsti karaa horaa na'i
89|9|arau chamuda sampradayara lagata (ki acarana karaichila) yisakale bhaiyamata sila kati ghara nirmana karaichila
89|10|arau suladandara adhikarai phira'a'unara lagata (ki acarana karaichila)
89|11|yisakale desata simalanghana karaichila
89|12|tara pichata tata asanti brd'dhi karaichila.
89|13|Phalata tomara pratipalake sihamtara oparata sastira cabuka maraile.
89|14|Niscaya tomara pratipalaka satarka drsti raakhe.
89|15|Arau manuhara prakrti enekuraa ye, yetiya tara pratipalake taka sanmana arau anugraha pradana karai paraiksa karae, tetiya si kaya, ‘mora pratipalake moka sanmanita karaiche’.
89|16|Arau yetiya taka paraiksa karaibalai tara jiraika sankucita karai diye, tetiya si kaya, ‘mora pratipalake moka lanchita karaiche’.
89|17|Ketiya'o nahaya, baram tomaloke etimaka samadara nakaraa
89|18|Arau tomaloke micakinaka khadya pradana karaibalai parasparae parasparaka utsahita nakaraa
89|19|arau tomaloke uttaraadhikarara sampada sampurnaraupe graasa karai peloraa
89|20|arau tomaloke dhana-sampadaka atikai bhalaporaa
89|21|ketiya'o nahaya. Yetiya prthiraikhanaka curna-bicurna karaa ha’ba
89|22|arau yetiya tomara pratipalaka agamana karaiba arau phiraistasakala saraibad'dhabharae upasthita ha’ba
89|23|arau se'idina jahannamaka upasthita karaa ha’ba, se'idina manuhe smarana karaiba, kintu e'i smarana tara kona kamata ahiba
89|24|(tetiya) si ka’ba, ‘haya! E'i jiranara babe ma'i yadi kiba agraima pathalohemtena
89|25|se'idina te'omra sastira darae sasti kone'o diba noraaraiba.
89|26|Arau te'omra bandhonara darae bandhona ana kone'o diba noraaraiba.
89|27|He prasanta atma
89|28|tumi tomara pratipalakara ocaralai ubhati aha santusta arau santosabhajana hai
89|29|arau mora bandasakalara antarbhukta hai yoraa
89|30|arau mora jannatata praraesa karaa.
